<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spell Relay](/Feats.aspx?ID=1817) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 139 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Wellspring Mage](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=104) (Level 8)

**Trigger**
An ally Casts a Spell and you are within that spell's range.

</column>

---

You open the power in your blood to your ally's spellcasting, using your magic to boost their range. Your ally can use you as the point of origin for their spell, calculating range and cover from your space instead of their own.
name: Spell Relay
